item.title: Home Audit
item.description: Here are some self audit stuff you can do around your home easily. Summary: ðŸ”— Avoid chemicals Avoid radiation Long version: Wifi - EMF ðŸ”— Use shielded ethernet cable like this one Once you do this, it is best to turn off Wi-Fi in your modem. Have proper grounding, if you do not have call a good electirician. Keyboard/Mouse: Best to use and old vintage ball wired mouse. For keyboard have a nice simple wired keyboard few inches away from your laptop.
